backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, active users, and role-based access control with admin‑gated deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two frontend features to affected files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app with cache‑busting settings and viewport meta tags.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout with header/footer rules, and theme/toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting or uploading avatars, including Giphy search, trending GIFs, and file uploads with debounced search.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Full chat interface handling message fetching, auto‑scrolling, replies, header collapse, sending messages, and pinned video rendering.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a clickable chatroom card with thumbnail, live badge, topic, category, and viewer/message stats.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with fields, media upload, video/Twitter URL validation, and Twitter embed loading.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with copyright text and a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar picker integration.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op component that renders nothing as authentication is intentionally disabled.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with reactions, media embeds, pinning, replies, and optional Twitter widgets.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Handles composing messages with text, image upload, video/Twitter URLs, and optional voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: File is empty or incomplete with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player with waveform visualization, playback controls, and synced state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Purges stale chatroom caches and forces refetch when the backend actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching chatrooms, lobby cards, and related data with polling and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with theme variables, global styles, mobile fixes, and custom audio slider styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats numbers into compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from the Giphy API.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression that resizes images, preserves orientation, and returns a smaller file when possible with progress callbacks.
frontend/src/lib/lobbyPlaceholderThumbna: Returns static placeholder thumbnail paths based on media type for lobby previews.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder file for Twitter embed rendering.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to produce a simplified preview with caching and deduped requests.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with versioning and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file for Twitter thumbnail utilities.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file for Twitter thumbnail caching.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts IDs and builds thumbnail URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter, with URL helpers for type detection.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and identity provider and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page with password gate allowing authenticated users to view and delete chatrooms.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments its view count, handles loading/error states, and renders the chat area.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: React page that fetches lobby chatroom summaries, applies client‑side search and category filtering, and renders chatroom cards with create-dialog support and navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing IC payload-size issues, planned lightweight chatroom summary changes, and related feature requests.
